alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:39AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Crockett, Weakley, eastern Dyer, Gibson, southeastern Obion, western Carroll and southwestern Henry Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 639 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Latham to Kenton to near Miston. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Martin, Humboldt, Milan, McKenzie, Trenton, Huntingdon, Newbern, Dresden, Alamo, Dyer, Greenfield, Gleason, Kenton, Rutherford, Bradford, Sharon, Atwood, Cottage Grove and Bradleytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley
